org.apache.giraph.comm

类 SendCache<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,T,B extends ByteArrayVertexIdData<I,T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.SendCache<I,T,B>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    T - Data
    B - Specialization of ByteArrayVertexIdData for T
    直接已知子类:
    SendEdgeCache, SendMessageCache

    public abstract class SendCache<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,T,B extends ByteArrayVertexIdData<I,T>>
extends Object
    An abstract structure for caching data indexed by vertex id, to be sent to workers in bulk. Not thread-safe.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      SendCache(ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration conf, CentralizedServiceWorker<?,?,?,?> serviceWorker, int maxRequestSize, float additionalRequestSize)
      Constructor.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int addData(WorkerInfo workerInfo, int partitionId, I destVertexId, T data)
      Add data to the cache.
      abstract B createByteArrayVertexIdData()
      Create a new ByteArrayVertexIdData specialized for the use case.
      PairList<WorkerInfo,PairList<Integer,B>> removeAllData()
      Gets all the data and removes it from the cache.
      PairList<Integer,B> removeWorkerData(WorkerInfo workerInfo)
      Gets the data for a worker and removes it from the cache.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SendCache

        public SendCache(ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration conf,
         CentralizedServiceWorker<?,?,?,?> serviceWorker,
         int maxRequestSize,
         float additionalRequestSize)
        Constructor.
        参数:
        conf - Giraph configuration
        serviceWorker - Service worker
        maxRequestSize - Maximum request size (in bytes)
        additionalRequestSize - Additional request size (expressed as a ratio of the average request size)

    • 方法详细资料

      • createByteArrayVertexIdData

        public abstract B createByteArrayVertexIdData()
        Create a new ByteArrayVertexIdData specialized for the use case.
        返回:
        A new instance of ByteArrayVertexIdData

      • addData

        public int addData(WorkerInfo workerInfo,
          int partitionId,
          I destVertexId,
          T data)
        Add data to the cache.
        参数:
        workerInfo - the remote worker destination
        partitionId - the remote Partition this message belongs to
        destVertexId - vertex id that is ultimate destination
        data - Data to send to remote worker
        返回:
        Size of messages for the worker.

      • removeWorkerData

        public PairList<Integer,B> removeWorkerData(WorkerInfo workerInfo)
        Gets the data for a worker and removes it from the cache.
        参数:
        workerInfo - the address of the worker who owns the data partitions that are receiving the data
        返回:
        List of pairs (partitionId, ByteArrayVertexIdData), where all partition ids belong to workerInfo

      • removeAllData

        public PairList<WorkerInfo,PairList<Integer,B>> removeAllData()
        Gets all the data and removes it from the cache.
        返回:
        All data for all vertices for all partitions
